an7.52:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava campayam viharati gaggaraya pokkharaniya tire.
an7.52:1.2: Atha kho sambahula campeyyaka upasaka yena ayasma sariputto tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho campeyyaka upasaka ayasmantam sariputtam etadavocum:
an7.52:1.4: Sadhu mayam, bhante, labheyyama bhagavato sammukha dhammim katham savanaya”ti.
an7.52:1.6: appeva nama labheyyatha bhagavato sammukha dhammim katham savanaya”ti.
an7.52:1.7: “Evam, bhante”ti kho campeyyaka upasaka ayasmato sariputtassa patissutva utthayasana ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
an7.52:2.1: Atha kho campeyyaka upasaka tadahuposathe yenayasma sariputto tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
an7.52:2.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto tehi campeyyakehi upasakehi saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.52:3.1: “Siya nu kho, bhante, idhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam;
an7.52:3.2: siya pana, bhante, idhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsan”ti?
an7.52:3.3: “Siya, sariputta, idhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam;
an7.52:3.4: siya pana, sariputta, idhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsan”ti.
an7.52:3.5: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam;
an7.52:3.6: ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsan”ti?
an7.52:4.1: “Idha, sariputta, ekacco sapekho danam deti, patibaddhacitto danam deti, sannidhipekho danam deti, ‘imam pecca paribhunjissami’ti danam deti.
an7.52:4.2: So tam danam deti samanassa va brahmanassa va annam panam vattham yanam malagandhavilepanam seyyavasathapadipeyyam.
an7.52:4.3: Tam kim mannasi, sariputta, dadeyya idhekacco evarupam danan”ti?
an7.52:5.1: “Tatra, sariputta, yvayam sapekho danam deti, patibaddhacitto danam deti, sannidhipekho danam deti, ‘imam pecca paribhunjissami’ti danam deti.
an7.52:5.2: So tam danam datva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an7.52:5.3: So tam kammam khepetva tam iddhim tam yasam tam adhipaccam agami hoti aganta itthattam.
an7.52:6.1: Idha pana, sariputta, ekacco na heva kho sapekho danam deti, na patibaddhacitto danam deti, na sannidhipekho danam deti, na ‘imam pecca paribhunjissami’ti danam deti;
an7.52:6.2: api ca kho ‘sahu danan’ti danam deti …pe….
an7.52:7.2: api ca kho ‘dinnapubbam katapubbam pitupitamahehi na arahami poranam kulavamsam hapetun’ti danam deti …pe….
an7.52:8.1: Napi ‘dinnapubbam katapubbam pitupitamahehi na arahami poranam kulavamsam hapetun’ti danam deti;
an7.52:8.2: api ca kho ‘aham pacami, ime na pacanti, narahami pacanto apacantanam danam adatun’ti danam deti …pe….
an7.52:9.1: Napi ‘aham pacami, ime na pacanti, narahami pacanto apacantanam danam adatun’ti danam deti;
an7.52:9.2: api ca kho ‘yatha tesam pubbakanam isinam tani mahayannani ahesum, seyyathidam—
an7.52:9.3: atthakassa vamakassa vamadevassa vessamittassa yamadaggino angirasassa bharadvajassa vasetthassa kassapassa bhaguno, evam me ayam danasamvibhago bhavissati’ti danam deti …pe….
an7.52:10.1: Napi ‘yatha tesam pubbakanam isinam tani mahayannani ahesum, seyyathidam—
an7.52:10.2: atthakassa vamakassa vamadevassa vessamittassa yamadaggino angirasassa bharadvajassa vasetthassa kassapassa bhaguno, evam me ayam danasamvibhago bhavissati’ti danam deti;
an7.52:10.3: api ca kho ‘imam me danam dadato cittam pasidati, attamanata somanassam upajayati’ti danam deti …pe….
an7.52:11.1: Napi ‘imam me danam dadato cittam pasidati, attamanata somanassam upajayati’ti danam deti;
an7.52:11.2: api ca kho cittalankaracittaparikkharam danam deti.
an7.52:11.3: So tam danam deti samanassa va brahmanassa va annam panam vattham yanam malagandhavilepanam seyyavasathapadipeyyam.
an7.52:11.4: Tam kim mannasi, sariputta, dadeyya idhekacco evarupam danan”ti?
an7.52:12.1: “Tatra, sariputta, yvayam na heva sapekho danam deti;
an7.52:12.6: napi ‘dinnapubbam katapubbam pitupitamahehi na arahami poranam kulavamsam hapetun’ti danam deti;
an7.52:12.7: napi ‘aham pacami, ime na pacanti, narahami pacanto apacantanam danam adatun’ti danam deti;
an7.52:12.8: napi ‘yatha tesam pubbakanam isinam tani mahayannani ahesum, seyyathidam—
an7.52:12.9: atthakassa vamakassa vamadevassa vessamittassa yamadaggino angirasassa bharadvajassa vasetthassa kassapassa bhaguno, evam me ayam danasamvibhago bhavissati’ti danam deti;
an7.52:12.10: napi ‘imam me danam dadato cittam pasidati, attamanata somanassam upajayati’ti danam deti;
an7.52:12.11: api ca kho cittalankaracittaparikkharam danam deti.
an7.52:12.12: So tam danam datva kayassa bheda param marana brahmakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
an7.52:12.13: So tam kammam khepetva tam iddhim tam yasam tam adhipaccam anagami hoti anaganta itthattam.
an7.52:13.1: Ayam kho, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo yena midhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam na mahapphalam hoti na mahanisamsam.
an7.52:13.2: Ayam pana, sariputta, hetu ayam paccayo yena midhekaccassa tadisamyeva danam dinnam mahapphalam hoti mahanisamsan”ti.
